conbody.p: This section provides sample lifecycle EDRs for different scenarios.

------------------------------------- CDR length: 396 Release ID | Version ID: 7|2 Data record format | TS number: 1|7 Release identifier extension: 0 Name Tag Data RecordType 0 LIFECYCLE_RECORD invokedBy 1 RenewSubscriptionAction triggeredEntityType 1 Account triggeredEntityId 1 Account80708 transitionName 1 RepeatCycle transitionStartState 1 Active entityLifeCycleName 1 DefaultAccountLifeCycle periodicLifeCycleName 1 AccountPeriodicLC_795681 accountType 1 PRE_PAID result 1 Fail reason 1 0 timeStamp 1 19/02/2019 04:34:00 RecordTimestamp 1 19/02/2019 11:04:00

conbody.p: When max renewal for the Subscription Lifecycle with Renew Subscription action reaches, for that subscription the result is fail and the reason is 12 (indicates MAX_RENEWAL_REACHED) in the CDR. All the Buckets/Counters for that Subscription are also generated. The Max Renewals indicates the maximum number of time a Subscription can be renewed.
conbody.codeblock: -------------------------------------- CDR length: 1526 Release ID | Version ID: 7|2 Data record format | TS number: 1|7 Release identifier extension: 0 Name Tag Data RecordType 0 LIFECYCLE_RECORD invokedBy 1 RenewSubscriptionAction triggeredEntityType 1 Subscription triggeredEntityId 1 76ebe854-e3d4-4d9b-b367-29497f157b6b transitionName 1 RepeatCycle transitionStartState 1 Start entityLifeCycleName 1 DefaultSubscriptionLifeCycle triggeredBy 1 AUDIT periodicLifeCycleName 1 LC2 accountID 1 HDFCBank accountType 1 PRE_PAID bundleName 1 Bun1 bundleActivationType 1 NORMAL accountBalanceBeforeRenew 1 0.0 accountBalanceAfterRenew 1 0.0 maxRenewals 1 0 remainingRenewals 1 0 subscriptionRenewalMode 1 ALL deviceId 1 JIO result 1 Fail reason 1 12 timeStamp 1 23/03/2020 16:55:45 RecordTimestamp 1 23/03/2020 11:25:45 RecordProperty 0 bucketInfo bucketName 1 Bucket2 bucketUnitType 1 GByte bucketKindOfUnit 1 VOLUME bucketBalanceBefore 1 107374182400 bucketBalanceAfter 1 107374182400 carryOverBucket 1 false RecordProperty 0 bucketInfo bucketName 1 Bucket1 bucketUnitType 1 GByte bucketKindOfUnit 1 VOLUME bucketBalanceBefore 1 107374182400 bucketBalanceAfter 1 107374182400 carryOverBucket 1 false RecordProperty 0 counterInfo counterName 1 Counter1 counterKey 1 d651eb8a-3cb3-4b1d-90a5-55092e43b86a counterType 1 COST counterUnitType 1 GByte counterKindOfUnit 1 VOLUME counterValueBefore 1 0 counterValueAfter 1 0 RecordProperty 0 counterInfo counterName 1 MultiCounter counterKey 1 9f7eca14-b7c4-428e-85fd-84364932e20d counterType 1 USAGE counterUnitType 1 GByte counterKindOfUnit 1 VOLUME counterValueBefore 1 0 counterValueAfter 1 0

conbody.p: When max renewal for the Account Lifecycle with Renew Subscription action has reached, for that subscription the result is fail and the reason is 12 (indicates MAX_RENEWAL_REACHED) in the CDR. All the Buckets/Counters for that Subscription are also generated. The Max Renewals indicates the maximum number of time a Subscription can be renewed.

conbody.p: When a plan is changed, the invoke method in the CDR is change_bundle. Data for both the old bundle and new bundle are also generated.
